alert.note: Alert for Northern Orange; Southern Newton; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 3:33AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana and northeastern Orange Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 333 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mauriceville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange, Vidor, Vinton, Mauriceville, Hartburg, Forest Heights and Toomey. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 872 and 867. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Northern Orange; Southern Newton; Southern Orange
